      • getDirection

        public Direction getDirection()
        The direction of the edges as a string. Possible values are outbound, inbound and any (default).
        Returns:
        the direction

        The direction of the edges as a string. Possible values are outbound, inbound and any (default).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this

      • getEdgeCollectionRestriction

        public List<String> getEdgeCollectionRestriction()
        One or multiple edge collection names. Only edges from these collections will be considered for the path.
        Returns:
        One or multiple edge collection names.

      • setEdgeCollectionRestriction

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        this

      • getStartVertexCollectionRestriction

        public List<String> getStartVertexCollectionRestriction()
        One or multiple vertex collection names. Only vertices from these collections will be considered as start vertex of a path.
        Returns:
        One or multiple vertex collection names.

      • setStartVertexCollectionRestriction

        One or multiple vertex collection names.

      • getWeight

        public String getWeight()
        The name of the attribute of the edges containing the length as a string.
        Returns:
        The name of the attribute

        public ShortestPathOptions setWeight(String weight)
        The name of the attribute of the edges containing the length as a string.
        Parameters:
        weight -
        Returns:
        this

      • getDefaultWeight

        public Long getDefaultWeight()
        Only used with the option weight. If an edge does not have the attribute named as defined in option weight this default is used as length. If no default is supplied the default would be positive Infinity so the path could not be calculated.
        Returns:
        a default weight

      • setDefaultWeight

        public ShortestPathOptions setDefaultWeight(Long defaultWeight)
        Only used with the option weight. If an edge does not have the attribute named as defined in option weight this default is used as length. If no default is supplied the default would be positive Infinity so the path could not be calculated.
        Parameters:
        defaultWeight -
        Returns:
        this

      • getIncludeData

        public Boolean getIncludeData()
        Get include data
        Returns:
        returns true, if the return values are compatible with older versions of AnrangoDB

      • setIncludeData

        public ShortestPathOptions setIncludeData(Boolean includeData)
        set include data to be compatible with older versions of AnrangoDB
        Parameters:
        includeData -
        Since:
        ArangoDB 2.6
